history.action: First reading, referred to State Government, Elections & Information Technology

Executive action taken in the House Committee on State Government, Elections & Information Technology at 1:30 PM.
SEIT - Majority; do pass.
Referred to Rules 2 Review.
By resolution, reintroduced and retained in present status.

Referred to State Government, Elections & Information Technology.

Executive session scheduled, but no action was taken in the House Committee on State Government, Elections & Information Technology at 10:00 AM.
Executive action taken in the House Committee on State Government, Elections & Information Technology at 8:00 AM.
SEIT - Majority; do pass.
Referred to Rules 2 Review.
Placed on second reading by Rules Committee.
Rules suspended. Placed on Third Reading.
Third reading, passed; yeas, 98; nays, 0; absent, 0; excused, 0.
First reading, referred to State Government, Tribal Relations & Elections.

SGTE - Majority; do pass.
Minority; without recommendation.
Passed to Rules Committee for second reading.
Placed on second reading by Rules Committee.
By resolution, returned to House Rules Committee for third reading.
